articles.description: Chance the Rapper fans will celebrate the 10-year anniversary of Acid Rap, and the Jollof Festival, froSkate pop-ups and a Pilsen walking tour are also on deck.
articles.content:
CHICAGO Summer is nearing an end, but Chicago isnt slowing down.
Catch jets and parachuters thunder through the sky at the renowned Air & Water Show, indulge in sweet BBQ at Ribfest, immerse you… [+11871 chars]
